content: A healthcareservice can be provided at multiple locations by multiple organizations. What is the perspective of keeping the cardinality of providedby ---> Reference(Organziation) 0..1 ? Screenshot-2021-06-08-at-9.02.50-PM.png Screenshot-2021-06-08-at-9.04.26-PM.png

Chetana, the HealthcareService profile is specific to an organization and a location. If an organization provides a healthcare service at multiple locations then there would be an instance of the healthcareService for each location.
